001package org.krmdemo.techlabs.core.dump;
002
003import org.krmdemo.techlabs.core.dump.json.JsonHtmlDumper;
004import org.krmdemo.techlabs.core.dump.json.JsonSvgDumper;
005import org.krmdemo.techlabs.core.dump.json.JsonTxtDumper;
006import org.krmdemo.techlabs.core.dump.render.Highlight;
007import org.krmdemo.techlabs.core.dump.render.RenderSpec;
008import org.krmdemo.techlabs.core.dump.yaml.YamlHtmlDumper;
009import org.krmdemo.techlabs.core.dump.yaml.YamlSvgDumper;
010import org.krmdemo.techlabs.core.dump.yaml.YamlTxtDumper;
011
012import java.io.File;
013import java.io.FileOutputStream;
014import java.io.IOException;
015import java.io.PrintStream;
016import java.util.function.BiFunction;
017import java.util.function.Function;
018
019import static org.krmdemo.techlabs.core.dump.JacksonTree.DEFAULT_JACKSON_TREE;
020
021/**
022 * Interface to represent any Java-Object in most popular hierarchical structures (JSON and YAML)
023 * and with suitable output formats (TXT, HTML, SVG) with a flexible way to control the highlighting of elements.
024 * Together with 3 most popular Java-API approaches (String, Std-Out and File) we have a multiple ways
025 * and a multiple API-methods that the current interface exposes.
026 * <hr/>
027 * It's also recommended to use methods from corresponding utility-classes.
028 *
029 * @see PrintUtils for standard output into console
030 * @see DumpUtils for output (dump) just as a string
031 * @see ToFileUtils for output into target file at local file-system
032 */
033public interface ObjectPrinter {
034
035    /**
036     * Default instance of {@link StdOut} that uses the default {@link JacksonTree}
037     */
038    StdOut DEFAULT_STD_OUT = new StdOut();
039
040    void printAsJsonTxt(Object objToPrint, RenderSpec renderSpec);
041
042    void printAsJsonHtml(Object objToPrint, RenderSpec renderSpec);
043
044    void printAsJsonSvg(Object objToPrint, RenderSpec renderSpec);
045
046    void printAsYamlTxt(Object objToPrint, RenderSpec renderSpec);
047
048    void printAsYamlHtml(Object objToPrint, RenderSpec renderSpec);
049
050    void printAsYamlSvg(Object objToPrint, RenderSpec renderSpec);
051
052    default void printAsJsonTxt(Object objToPrint) {
053        printAsJsonTxt(objToPrint, new RenderSpec(Highlight.NONE));  // <-- TODO: think about passing "Highlight.DEFAULT"
054    }
055
056    default void printAsJsonHtml(Object objToPrint) {
057        printAsJsonHtml(objToPrint, new RenderSpec(Highlight.NONE));
058    }
059
060    default void printAsJsonSvg(Object objToPrint) {
061        printAsJsonSvg(objToPrint, new RenderSpec(Highlight.NONE));
062    }
063
064    default void printAsYamlTxt(Object objToPrint) {
065        printAsYamlTxt(objToPrint, new RenderSpec(Highlight.NONE));  // <-- TODO: think about passing "Highlight.DEFAULT"
066    }
067
068    default void printAsYamlHtml(Object objToPrint) {
069        printAsYamlHtml(objToPrint, new RenderSpec(Highlight.NONE));
070    }
071
072    default void printAsYamlSvg(Object objToPrint) {
073        printAsYamlSvg(objToPrint, new RenderSpec(Highlight.NONE));
074    }
075
076    /**
077     * This Java-record is a kind of element in multidimensional virtual methods' table,
078     * which acts as a bridge between two hierarchies of different implementations of:<ul>
079     *     <li>{@link TreeDumper.Node} (the default factory is {@link JacksonTree#DEFAULT_JACKSON_TREE})</li>
080     *     <li>{@link ObjectPrinter} - {@link StdOut StdOut}, {@link ToString ToString} and {@link ToFile ToFile}</li>
081     * </ul>
082     * Further interaction two hierarchies are performed via well known and very popular
083     * <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Visitor_pattern">Visitor pattern</a>
084     *
085     * @param dumperNodeFunc a factory to create a root {@link TreeDumper.Node} from the object to dump
086     * @param dumperFactory a factory to create a proper instance of {@link TreeDumper}
087     */
088    record UnitOp(
089        Function<Object, TreeDumper.Node> dumperNodeFunc,
090        BiFunction<PrintStream, RenderSpec, TreeDumper> dumperFactory
091    ) {
092        void printStdOut(Object objToPrint, RenderSpec renderSpec) {
093            print(System.out, objToPrint, renderSpec);
094        }
095        void print(PrintStream out, Object objToPrint, RenderSpec renderSpec) {
096            TreeDumper.Node root = dumperNodeFunc.apply(objToPrint);
097            TreeDumper dumper = dumperFactory.apply(out, renderSpec);
098            dumper.acceptRoot(root);
099        }
100    }
101
102    /**
103     *
104     */
105    class StdOut implements ObjectPrinter {
106        private final Function<Object, TreeDumper.Node> dumperNodeFunc;
107
108        public StdOut() {
109            this(DEFAULT_JACKSON_TREE::dumperNode);
110        }
111
112        public StdOut(Function<Object, TreeDumper.Node> dumperNodeFunc) {
113            this.dumperNodeFunc = dumperNodeFunc;
114        }
115
116        @Override
117        public void printAsJsonTxt(Object objToPrint, RenderSpec renderSpec) {
118            UnitOp unitOp = new UnitOp(dumperNodeFunc, JsonTxtDumper::new);
119            unitOp.printStdOut(objToPrint, renderSpec);
120        }
121
122        @Override
123        public void printAsJsonHtml(Object objToPrint, RenderSpec renderSpec) {
124            UnitOp unitOp = new UnitOp(dumperNodeFunc, JsonHtmlDumper::new);
125            unitOp.printStdOut(objToPrint, renderSpec);
126        }
127
128        @Override
129        public void printAsJsonSvg(Object objToPrint, RenderSpec renderSpec) {
130            UnitOp unitOp = new UnitOp(dumperNodeFunc, JsonSvgDumper::new);
131            unitOp.printStdOut(objToPrint, renderSpec);
132        }
133
134        @Override
135        public void printAsYamlTxt(Object objToPrint, RenderSpec renderSpec) {
136            UnitOp unitOp = new UnitOp(dumperNodeFunc, YamlTxtDumper::new);
137            unitOp.printStdOut(objToPrint, renderSpec);
138        }
139
140        @Override
141        public void printAsYamlHtml(Object objToPrint, RenderSpec renderSpec) {
142            UnitOp unitOp = new UnitOp(dumperNodeFunc, YamlHtmlDumper::new);
143            unitOp.printStdOut(objToPrint, renderSpec);
144        }
145
146        @Override
147        public void printAsYamlSvg(Object objToPrint, RenderSpec renderSpec) {
148            UnitOp unitOp = new UnitOp(dumperNodeFunc, YamlSvgDumper::new);
149            unitOp.printStdOut(objToPrint, renderSpec);
150        }
151    }
152
153    /**
154     *
155     */
156    class ToString implements ObjectPrinter {
157        private final StringBuilderOut out = StringBuilderOut.create();
158        private final Function<Object, TreeDumper.Node> dumperNodeFunc;
159
160        public ToString() {
161            this(DEFAULT_JACKSON_TREE::dumperNode);
162        }
163
164        public ToString(Function<Object, TreeDumper.Node> dumperNodeFunc) {
165            this.dumperNodeFunc = dumperNodeFunc;
166        }
167
168        public StringBuilder stringBuilder() {
169            return this.out.stringBuilder();
170        }
171
172        @Override
173        public String toString() {
174            return this.out.toString();
175        }
176
177        @Override
178        public void printAsJsonTxt(Object objToPrint, RenderSpec renderSpec) {
179            UnitOp unitOp = new UnitOp(dumperNodeFunc, JsonTxtDumper::new);
180            unitOp.print(this.out, objToPrint, renderSpec);
181        }
182
183        @Override
184        public void printAsJsonHtml(Object objToPrint, RenderSpec renderSpec) {
185            UnitOp unitOp = new UnitOp(dumperNodeFunc, JsonHtmlDumper::new);
186            unitOp.print(this.out, objToPrint, renderSpec);
187        }
188
189        @Override
190        public void printAsJsonSvg(Object objToPrint, RenderSpec renderSpec) {
191            UnitOp unitOp = new UnitOp(dumperNodeFunc, JsonSvgDumper::new);
192            unitOp.print(this.out, objToPrint, renderSpec);
193        }
194
195        @Override
196        public void printAsYamlTxt(Object objToPrint, RenderSpec renderSpec) {
197            UnitOp unitOp = new UnitOp(dumperNodeFunc, YamlTxtDumper::new);
198            unitOp.print(this.out, objToPrint, renderSpec);
199        }
200
201        @Override
202        public void printAsYamlHtml(Object objToPrint, RenderSpec renderSpec) {
203            UnitOp unitOp = new UnitOp(dumperNodeFunc, YamlHtmlDumper::new);
204            unitOp.print(this.out, objToPrint, renderSpec);
205        }
206
207        @Override
208        public void printAsYamlSvg(Object objToPrint, RenderSpec renderSpec) {
209            UnitOp unitOp = new UnitOp(dumperNodeFunc, YamlSvgDumper::new);
210            unitOp.print(this.out, objToPrint, renderSpec);
211        }
212    }
213
214    /**
215     *
216     */
217    class ToFile implements ObjectPrinter {
218        private final File file;
219        private final Function<Object, TreeDumper.Node> dumperNodeFunc;
220
221        public ToFile(File file) {
222            this(file, DEFAULT_JACKSON_TREE::dumperNode);
223        }
224
225        public ToFile(File file, Function<Object, TreeDumper.Node> dumperNodeFunc) {
226            this.file = file;
227            this.dumperNodeFunc = dumperNodeFunc;
228        }
229
230        PrintStream filePrintStream() {
231            try {
232                return new PrintStream(new FileOutputStream(file));
233            } catch (IOException ioEx) {
234                throw new IllegalStateException("could not print to file " + file, ioEx);
235            }
236        }
237
238        @Override
239        public void printAsJsonTxt(Object objToPrint, RenderSpec renderSpec) {
240            UnitOp unitOp = new UnitOp(dumperNodeFunc, JsonTxtDumper::new);
241            unitOp.print(this.filePrintStream(), objToPrint, renderSpec);
242        }
243
244        @Override
245        public void printAsJsonHtml(Object objToPrint, RenderSpec renderSpec) {
246            UnitOp unitOp = new UnitOp(dumperNodeFunc, JsonHtmlDumper::new);
247            unitOp.print(this.filePrintStream(), objToPrint, renderSpec);
248        }
249
250        @Override
251        public void printAsJsonSvg(Object objToPrint, RenderSpec renderSpec) {
252            UnitOp unitOp = new UnitOp(dumperNodeFunc, JsonSvgDumper::new);
253            unitOp.print(this.filePrintStream(), objToPrint, renderSpec);
254        }
255
256        @Override
257        public void printAsYamlTxt(Object objToPrint, RenderSpec renderSpec) {
258            UnitOp unitOp = new UnitOp(dumperNodeFunc, YamlTxtDumper::new);
259            unitOp.print(this.filePrintStream(), objToPrint, renderSpec);
260        }
261
262        @Override
263        public void printAsYamlHtml(Object objToPrint, RenderSpec renderSpec) {
264            UnitOp unitOp = new UnitOp(dumperNodeFunc, YamlHtmlDumper::new);
265            unitOp.print(this.filePrintStream(), objToPrint, renderSpec);
266        }
267
268        @Override
269        public void printAsYamlSvg(Object objToPrint, RenderSpec renderSpec) {
270            UnitOp unitOp = new UnitOp(dumperNodeFunc, YamlSvgDumper::new);
271            unitOp.print(this.filePrintStream(), objToPrint, renderSpec);
272        }
273    }
274}
